import React, { useState } from 'react'; import { Container, Row, Col, Form, Button, Alert } from 'react-bootstrap'; import { useMemberCount } from '../../context/MemberContext'; import './Membership.css'; const Membership = () => { const { memberCount, updateMemberCount } = useMemberCount(); const [formData, setFormData] = useState({ surname: '', name: '', dob: '', gender: '', nationality: '', address: '', phone: '', email: '', occupation: '', emergencyContact: '', emergencyPhone: '', membershipType: 'individual', paymentMethod: 'cash' }); const [showSuccess, setShowSuccess] = useState(false); const [showError, setShowError] = useState(false); const handleChange = (e) => { const { name, value } = e.target; setFormData(prev => ({ ...prev, [name]: value })); }; const handleSubmit = async (e) => { e.preventDefault(); try { // Here you would typically make an API call to save the member data // For now, we'll just simulate a successful registration await new Promise(resolve => setTimeout(resolve, 1000)); // Update the member count updateMemberCount(memberCount + 1); setShowSuccess(true); setShowError(false); setFormData({ surname: '', name: '', dob: '', gender: '', nationality: '', address: '', phone: '', email: '', occupation: '', emergencyContact: '', emergencyPhone: '', membershipType: 'individual', paymentMethod: 'cash' }); } catch (error) { setShowError(true); setShowSuccess(false); } }; return (

Membership Registration

{showSuccess && ( setShowSuccess(false)} dismissible> Registration successful! Welcome to our community. )} {showError && ( setShowError(false)} dismissible> An error occurred. Please try again. )}
Surname Name Date of Birth Gender Nationality Address Phone Email Occupation Emergency Contact Emergency Phone Membership Type Payment Method
); }; export default Membership;
